member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Data.Configuration.Preference
member.summary: Defines the user preferences in the program.
member.remarks:
Due to the special initialization mechanism, the properties of the type should satisfy the following conditions:
Only properties that contains both getter and normal setter (and not a setter) can be loaded, initialized and displayed to the settings page.
The property must be applied both attribute types and .
If the property is a non-formal preference item, a double extra leading underscore characters "__" will be inserted into the property name; otherwise, a normal property name is applied.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Data.Configuration.Preference.AuxiliaryColors
member.remarks:
The default value is an array of 3 elements:
#FF7FBBFF
#FFD8B2FF
#FFFFFF96

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Data.Configuration.Preference.AlmostLockedSetColors
member.remarks:
The default value is an array of 5 elements:
#FFC5E88C
#FFFFCBCB
#FFB2DFDF
#FFFCDCA5
#FFFFFF96
The former 4 items of this array are referenced from sudoku project Hodoku.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Data.Configuration.Preference.PaletteColors
member.remarks:
The default value is an array of 10 elements:
#FFFFC059 (Orange)
#FFB1A5F3 (Light purple)
#FFF7A5A7 (Red)
#FF86E8D0 (Sky blue)
#FF86F280 (Light green)
#FFF7DE8F (Light orange)
#FFDCD4FC (Whitey purple)
#FFFFD2D2 (Light red)
#FFCEFBED (Whitey blue)
#FFD7FFD7 (Whitey green)
All values of this array are referenced from sudoku project Hodoku.
